title: 결과 강조 - 교훈적 결과
description: 교훈과 깨달음을 주는 결과를 강조하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: It was a really good experience. I learned so much.
I gained a valuable lesson. It's an experience you can't buy.
I feel like I've grown a lot through this experience.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 교훈적 결과 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 정말 좋은 경험이었어. 많은 걸 배웠어.
sentences.en: It was a really good experience. I learned so much.

sentences.kr: 값진 교훈을 얻었네. 돈 주고도 못 살 경험이야.
sentences.en: I gained a valuable lesson. It's an experience you can't buy.

sentences.kr: 이번 일로 많이 성장한 것 같아.
sentences.en: I feel like I've grown a lot through this experience.
We failed, but we gained even more.
It was tough, but I learned just as much.

sentences.kr: 이런 결과를 통해 진짜 중요한 걸 깨달았어.
sentences.en: Through this result, I realized what's truly important.
I was frustrated, but I discovered new possibilities.

sentences.kr: 예상과 달랐지만, 더 의미 있는 결과야.
sentences.en: It was different from expectations, but it's a more meaningful result.
